name: SMART Global Holdings, Inc.
description: SMART Global Holdings, Inc. is a leading provider of specialty memory solutions and electronic components. Founded in 1988, the company focuses on delivering innovative memory and storage products tailored for various industries, including computing, networking, and telecommunications. SMART's product portfolio includes DRAM modules, SSDs, and memory products designed for high-performance applications. The company operates through three main segments: Memory Solutions, LED Solutions, and Advanced Microelectronics. SMART is committed to quality and customer satisfaction, leveraging its strong engineering capabilities to meet the evolving needs of its global customers. With a dedicated team of professionals and a commitment to research and development, SMART Global Holdings strives to maintain its competitive edge and drive growth in the fast-paced technology landscape. The company has a strong presence in key markets, serving a diverse customer base that includes original equipment manufacturers (OEMs), distributors, and end-users. Through strategic partnerships and acquisitions, SMART continues to expand its market reach and enhance its product offerings, positioning itself as a trusted leader in the memory and electronic component industry.
